objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced Autofocus System
• Retro-Inspired Design
• Built-in Wi-Fi for Sharing

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Camera - Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• Premium 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Retro-inspired classic design with durable metal construction
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 focus points for precise shooting
• Full manual control dials for professional-grade operation
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (2.36M dots)
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angles
• Built-in Wi-Fi for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Film simulation modes for creative expression
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Fast continuous shooting up to 8 fps
• Weather-sealed body for durability

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, tech-themed layout with a dark geometric grid background divided into quadrant tones to add structure and visual depth. A camera product image takes the spotlight on the right half, cropped and placed on top for clear visibility. At the top left sits a large headline text (`heading`) with a smaller subheading (`subheading`) beneath it. Below those are a vibrant tagline (`tagline`) in orange, followed by a callout text (`discount_text`) promoting a special discount. Four bullet points (`description`) list key product features. On the bottom right, a striking offer price (`price`) is paired with a vibrant rectangular button (`cta_background`) featuring CTA text (`cta`) and an attention-grabbing label above (`offer_text`). 

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black (#1A1A1A)
- Deep Gray (#252525, #333333)
- Orange Accent (#FF6B00)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, with a sleek and professional aesthetic. Dominated by matte and glossy blacks (#1A1A1A and #2B2B2B), the body of the camera contrasts with sharp white lettering (#FFFFFF) on the brand name and model. Subtle metallic highlights, seen on the lens rings and dials, use shades of gunmetal gray (#5E5E5E) and silver (#C0C0C0). The lens glass features an elegant gradient with touches of lime green (#A1C86C), cyan (#94E3DD), and amber (#F6B84C), creating vibrant focal interest. This sophisticated, monochrome-based palette with small pops of color can be used for a minimalist and luxurious advertisement design.
